definition: peaceful/restful/quiet/still
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Anson Chan (1940-), chief secretary for administration, Hong Kong (1997-2001)

sentences.english: Anson Chan decried the comments by Tsang as a "provocation and personal attack".
sentences.chinese: 陈方安生谴责曾德成的言论是挑衅及人身攻击。

sentences.english: I think I have the ability, in line with Anson concept.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我所具备的能力，符合安生理念。

sentences.english: From then on, the Wangs never had a day's peace.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，王家就再没有过一天的安生日子。

sentences.english: I am also deeply in love with Anson.
sentences.chinese: 而我，也深深地喜欢上了安生。

sentences.english: Quiet initial contact is in an interview.
sentences.chinese: 最初接触安生，是在一次面试中。

sentences.english: Anson selection of personnel, is to go international.
sentences.chinese: 安生挑选的人才，是要走向国际的。

sentences.english: They have been racked by bitter quarrels.
sentences.chinese: 激烈的争吵使他们不得安生。

sentences.english: Would HKUPOP conduct popularity surveys on Anson Chan and Regina Ip?
sentences.chinese: 民研计划会否对陈方安生和叶刘淑仪进行民望调查？

sentences.english: If he does go abroad, he must have a fixed place to which he goes.
sentences.chinese: 如果真的远渡他国，他一定有安生立命之所。

sentences.english: She was also the bouncing-off-the-walls type of baby.
sentences.chinese: 她也确实是那种让人不得安生的孩子。

sentences.english: Officers seized documents and a computer from Chan's home in Gough Hill Road on The Peak.
sentences.chinese: 检获的文件和从安生在歌赋山道家用电脑上山顶。

sentences.english: Outdoors, mosquitoes and midges were a perpetual torment .
sentences.chinese: 在户外，蚊子和蠓虫永远让人不得安生。

sentences.english: In 1978, Diane gave birth to their first child, Alissa.
sentences.chinese: 1978年，黛安生了他们的第一个孩子爱丽萨。

smooth and steady

Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place
to disturb/to create confusion/to make a din
in good condition/perfectly good/carefully/well/thoroughly

comfortable/at ease

to live together in harmony
